long_description: Loaded with pop, and featuring full rocker and a twin-tip shape, the Burton Blunt snowboard is the park-approved, trick-throwing, landing-stomping, fast-spinning fun ride you've been seeking. Burton Channel system offers unlimited, on-the-fly stance adjustability and enhances board feel; compatible with traditional Burton 3D bindings. The Channel lets you fine-tune your stance width to the millimeter, and then dial in your toe-to-heel centering and rotate your angles in one fell swoop. Flat Top profile features flat rocker between your feet and a rockered tip and tail for stability, balance and continuous edge control-perfect for the park. Twin shape and twin flex: this board is symmetrical from tip to tail for a balanced ride that's equally versatile whether ridden regular or switch. Classic tip-to-tail wood core offers a balanced, playful ride; carbon stringers radiate energy outward toward tip and tail for added snap and power. Fiberglass incorporated into the board provides torsional forgiveness and a park-friendly feel, perfect for helping you advance to the next level. Pro-Tip(TM) edges are tapered at tip and tail, reducing swing weight and improving float in powder; tip and tail feature an exaggerated scoop profile for a forgiving feel. Easy-to-maintain extruded base enhances speed and durability to keep you moving fast in all snow conditions. .
